import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { getTotals } from '../redux/cartSlice' const Header = () => { dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => dispatch(getTotals()), []) return (

CareerKings

cart {getTotals}
) } export default Header
